txt.en: A few of the creatures lurking within the Water-wheels had grown powerful indeed over the years, but you have defeated them.
Lizards of many shapes and sizes have come to infest the Water-wheels, but you have driven many of them off.
Your efforts have seen most of the lizards that had come to infest the Water-wheels defeated or driven off into the deeps.
The flooded Water-wheels spawn numerous creatures and plants which choke the workings of the mechanisms.
You have gathered specimens of several unusual plants within the Water-works.
